mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, name, gender, age, telephone, register_mode, third_party_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdPartyId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_mode = #{registerMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, third_party_id = #{thirdPartyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, gender, age, telephone, register_mode, third_party_id from user_info
